title: Rutgers Launches World’s First Accelerated Testing Facility for Bridges (Rutgers University)
text: ( Source : Rutgers University ) Rutgers is launching the world's first outdoor laboratory capable of simulating deterioration that occurs on bridges by inflicting and intensifying stresses from the environment and heavy traffic on sections of
